income_messages:
From: p*********1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-17 18:05:56
SUBJECT: MY NAME IS  DR PAUL CHIGBO  FR
MY NAME IS  DR PAUL CHIGBO  FROM  CBN ,I AM NEWLY APPOINTED TO HEAD THE DEPARTMENT OF (FFSD) IN THE APEX BANK (CBN). AND I AM A NIGERIAN .IN PURSUIT, I AND TWO OTHER STAFF OF MY DEPARTMENT FOUND OUT SOME IRREGULARITIES GOING ON WITH YOUR PAYMENT ,WE FOUND OUT THAT YOU HAD MET ALL THE STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS FOR YOU TO BE PAID BY OUR BANK BUT ALL EFFORTS WAS FUTILE  . I AM NOT HAPPY IN ANY WAY ON HOW SOME STAFFS ARE IN COLLABORATIONS WITH GHOST WORKERS WHICH THEY  HAS BEEN EXTORTING MONEY FROM YOU IN A  PRETEXT TO HELP YOU RECEIVE YOUR (TEN MILLION DOLLARS)  THAT WAS KEPT ON HOLD FOR THE PAST YEARS AGO  .
I WILL ADVISE YOU FROM THIS MOMENT TO DECLINE OR STOP FROM COMMUNICATING WITH THESE UNSCRUPULOUS ELEMENTS THAT PARADED  THEMSELVES TO BE GOOD INNOCENT PEOPLE, I  WANT TO LET YOU KNOW THAT IF YOU DID NOT STOP FROM DEALING WITH THIS BAD ELEMENTS , NOTE THAT YOU WILL CONTINUE PAYING YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY TO THEM  WITH THEIR ENDLESS STORIES, REQUESTING ONE CERTIFICATE TO ANOTHER. I CAN ASSURE YOU THAT SINCE FEW YEARS AGO THIS THEIR FRAUDULENT ACTIVITIES HAD STARTED AND NONE OF THEM CAN PAY YOU  $100 OR THE SUPPOSED MONEY OWED TO YOU . NOTE THAT ALL THE MONEY YOU HAD PAID TO THEM WERE USED FOR THEIR PERSONAL  BENEFITS, I REPEAT THAT YOU SHOULD STOP ANY FURTHER CORRESPONDENCE WITH THIS IMPERSONATORS, UNSCRUPULOUS HUMAN BEINGS.
IT IS A PITY THAT THIS PEOPLE HAD EXTORTED MUCH MONEY FROM YOU BUT I HAD PERSONALLY INTRODUCED A DEVICE THAT CAN BE POSSIBLY USE TO PAY YOU ALL THIS MONEY BEEN OWED TO YOU WITHOUT ANY FURTHER DOCUMENTATIONS, BUT IT MUST BE KEEP SECRET BECAUSE I WANT TO USE THE METHOD NIGERIAN  GOVERNMENT TOP OFFICIALS USED TO BRING IN  AND OUT FOREIGN CURRENCIES INTO OUR COUNTRY , ALSO  SAME  WAY  BY USING A SERVICE OF A DIPLOMAT ATTACHE FROM AN EMBASSY ,  IT WILL BE ARRANGED THROUGH DIPLOMATIC PREFERENCE CARRIAGE SCHEME  . I WILL  DISPATCH ONE BOX THAT WILL CONTAINED $10M AND OF $100 BILLS TO YOUR PRIVATE ADDRESS AND AFTER RECEIPT OF THE BOXES AND YOU CONFIRM THE CONTENTS BY HELP OF YOUR BANKERS, I WILL ARRANGE TO COME OVER THERE FOR MY SHARES OF 5%.
I WILL ADVISE THAT YOU WILL NOT LET ANY BODY TO KNOW ABOUT THIS METHOD TO AVOID SOME PEOPLE EYEBROWS. I HAD ARRANGED WITH A DIPLOMAT ATTACHE , THE COMPANY AGREED TO DISPATCH THE BOX  BUT I DID NOT DISCLOSED TO THEM THE AMOUNT INVOLVE , THIS IS TO GUIDE AGAINST THEFT .
I WILL FINALLY CONCLUDE WITH THE DIPLOMAT  WHEN I RECEIVE YOUR CONSENT OF INTEREST AND  GO AHEAD ORDER , KINDLY STOP ANY FURTHER DISCUSSION WITH THESE PEOPLE  AND DO NOT PAY ANY MORE MONEY TO THEM OR TO THOSE CALLED THEMSELVES BANK OFFICIALS,
I WILL FURNISH YOU WITH MORE INFORMATION AS SOON AS I RECEIVED YOUR GO AHEAD ORDER FROM YOU  AND WE WILL SHARE THE FUND WHEN IT IS SAFELY DELIVERED ,  MOST IMPORTANTLY ,  BEAR IN MIND , THE DIPLOMAT AGENT HAS VIVIDLY CONFIRMED THAT 
WE SHOULD PROVIDE THE COMPANY WITH THIS INFORMATION BELOW.
(1) YOUR PRIVATE ADDRESS WHERE TO DELIVER THE BOXES
(2) YOUR PRIVATE PHONE NUMBERS
(3) 
YOUR COPY OF IDENTITY OF ANY KIND
ALONG WITH NUMBER BELOW
(4) ON MY SIDE I WANT A PROMISSORY NOTE OF 5% OF THE FUND FROM YOU , IT WILL BE AGREEABLE BETWEEN US TO GIVE M(E COMPENSATION  IMMEDIATELY IT IS SUCCESSFULLY DELIVERED .
AWAITING TO HEAR FROM YOUR QUICK RESPONSES BEFORE I SHOULD PROCEED FURTHER .
BEST REGARDS
DR PAUL CHIGBO
CBN,DEPT (FFSD),
From: p*********1@gmail.com
To: ez28502@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-19 12:27:58
SUBJECT: Re: MY NAME IS DR PAUL CHIGBO FR
I AM HAPPY HEARING FROM YOU , MY PERSONAL PLAN IS TO MOVE THE BOX OUT OF MY
COUNTRY AND USE MY SHARE TO ESTABLISH MYSELF AND MY FAMILY OVER THERE AFTER
RECEIVING MY SHARE FROM YOU .
From: p*********1@gmail.com
To: ez28502@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-20 09:50:23
SUBJECT: Re: MY NAME IS DR PAUL CHIGBO FR
THERE IS NO RISK INVOLVE , THE MONEY WAS AN OVER-INVOICE CONTRACT BILL
WHICH WAS EXECUTED IN MY DEPARTMENT IN THE BANK HERE , I PURPOSELY
OVER-INVOICE THE CONTRACT TO HAVE SOME MONEY OUT OF IT FOR MY PERSONAL
BENEFITS .  I HAD PERFECTED THE DELIVERY ARRANGEMENT VIA THE DIPLOMAT
ATTACHE FROM AN EMBASSY HERE , THE DIPLOMAT IS BEEN USED TO DISPATCH AND
DELIVERY GOVERNMENT TOP SECRET BELONGINGS AND MONEY AND HE USE IS
DIPLOMATIC PASSPORT AND LICENSE THE CARRY OUT THE DELIVERY SERVICES ,
THEREFORE YOU SHOULD NOT BE BOTHER OF THE RISK INVOLVE , THERE IS NO RISK
OK.
ON RECEIPT OF THIS MESSAGE I EXPECT YOU TO FORWARD TO ME YOUR FOLLOWING
INFORMATION TO ENABLE ME COMMENCE THE PROCESS ,  (1) YOUR RECEIVING ADDRESS
AT  HOME OR OFFICE (2) YOUR DIRECT PHONE NUMBERS , TO COMMUNICATE TO YOUR
EASILY .
From: p*********1@gmail.com
To: ez28502@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-20 11:23:08
SUBJECT: Re: MY NAME IS DR PAUL CHIGBO FR
I hereby reconfirmed to you that there is no risk involve in this
transaction, delivery arrangement has concluded , if you are ready forward
i stated in my previous mail but if you are not interested i will advise
you to renege from further correspondence because this transaction has been
programmed with time schedule to handle it .

To: ez28502@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-21 10:39:46
SUBJECT: Re: MY NAME IS DR PAUL CHIGBO FR
Are you serious about receiving the cash at your end , if you want it ,
kindly forward the required information i needed to proceed with .

please decline to handle the transaction
From: p*********1@gmail.com
To: ez28502@m**************m

SUBJECT: Re: MY NAME IS DR PAUL CHIGBO FR
please there is no risk involved in this transaction, i told you lately

transaction do not bother to reply .
